string.text: Clean the mutants lair
Lumberjack asked to destroy the mutants lair, as they cause some problems.

It is necessary to destroy some of the mutants. The place here and so in the stalker environment is unpopular, so many people have a desire to go here because of fucking mutants, who are in the forest and on the road, even on the approaches full. In general, with my coordinates and reward, with your execution. I'll give you two days deadline. Agreed?
Thanks, maybe even people will heap more here. Get to work:
Find artifact: %s
Lumberjack asked to get for him a certain artifact on behalf of the customer.
I have some interested parties. It’s not good here for me to instruct other stalkers to get him. Only need to deliver in time, maximum 6 days. How are you?
Your specific goal will be: {item_name}. For a fee of course. Well, good luck or what.
Well done, what you need. Hold on:
Destroy bandits camp
You need to attack bandits camp and destroy them.
There is a post not far from here, the military were once there, and now the bandits have settled there. Can you handle them?
Well done man, keep your reward:
PDA of a "Crystal" member

Tons of weird and incoherent information, among which one can understand that the members of this detachment come from the best military services. Probably, they supervised the experiments conducted at the NPP before and after the first explosion, then were later zombied.
PDA of a "Crystal" member
The device is hopelessly flawed.
PDA of a "Crystal" member

"The great Monolith said he was in danger, and the brothers were dispersed and put on alert. No one is expressing an opinion on what is happening outside, and it seems that today we have to kill or die. I would be happy to do so for Monolith."
PDA of a "Crystal" member

There is nothing remarkable in the memory of the device, except for one single note dated June 2012:\n"The last few days the Monolith stopped appearing to me in dreams. Instead, I began to see episodes from someone's life, perhaps even mine. Is it really He my faith in Him is not strong enough? Then I am ready to demonstrate to Him how unshakable I am. After all, today has come the same day. The day when dozens, hundreds of fools will try to get close to His radiance. Today they will learn the power of the Monolith defenders."
PDA of a "Crystal" member

And this is the CCP member of the fraternity, who has been doing several other things than regular patrols. Here is a description of a certain "revelation room" in which apparently the brains were set to "incorrect." The description of the "mysterious visions" most likely resembles an image broadcast through a monitor. Apparently, in addition to the hitherto unknown zombie waves of the "Vyzhigatel", the owners of this place did not disdain to use the method of direct zombies on their future soldiers, through their "televisions". Old as the world, but here is more effective.
PDA of a "Crystal" member

We loaded the bodies into the truck, gave the device with instructions. A thunderstorm was raging. Finally, the car was handed over to the fraternity, Monolith tells them where to go. I remember the face of a man with a scar, I think I saw him somewhere."
Go to the sarcophagus
Find all the possible information about the "Crystal" group
Return to the Inquisitor
The inquisitor offered me to get to know myself more closely with the once-legendary group of defenders of the Monolith and find some information about them.
Find a gauss rifle
Technician Cardan wants to get himself a gauss gun.

Yes, there is such a thing. I used to work here, before the first explosion we developed any weapons for military needs, but after the explosion, we were evacuated and I completely quit my job. I can not even imagine that the work on the improvement of our prototype will continue. Stalker, I need a gauss gun, I already held it in my hands when one of the stalkers brought it to me, but I want to try to improve it somehow. Bring it for me, and I'll start riveting the batteries for it. Well, are you agree ?

Yes, there is such a thing. I used to work here, before the first explosion we developed any weapons for military needs, but after the explosion, we were evacuated and I completely quit my job. I can not even imagine that the work on the improvement of our prototype will continue. Stalker, I need a gauss gun, I already held it in my hands when one of the stalkers brought it to me, but I want to try to improve it somehow. Bring it for me, and I'll start riveting the batteries for it. Well, how ?
Thank you, here you go, I prepared you a couple. Contact at any time.
Resurection: Talk to first brother
Resurection: Talk to second brother
Resurection: Talk to a third brother
Resurection: Talk to the fourth brother
Resurection: Guessing with the Mentor
In business ... I wonder why he does not suspect me?
Local merchant opening hours: from 6AM to 8PM
So okay, stop taking revenge and go back to Radar, our fighters need help, talk to Griffin, he is in charge of our Wings group.
Find the annoying one
Destroy Alpha
Someone annoys Fat and he wants this person to no longer be. We need to help him in this.
Find the %s artifact for the Hoarder
Need to find artifact: %s. Execution time - 6 days.
Work is as always. I need some artifact, will you get it?
{item_name} - I need this one right now. I give you six days. Good luck.
Thank. You deserved:
Take the container to Sakharov

A trader from a landfill offered a job as a messenger. This container can be attributed, in which there is clearly not one art, but you can ... Hmm, I don’t even know who could open this case. Maybe Sapsan? Execution time - 2 days.

I look you are an experienced one, so I trust you. I am sure that it will not be difficult for you to deliver the container to Yantar. You have two days for everything. Will you drag this case to Sakharov?
ell done, man. Honestly earned:

Big galvanized metal container. Contains a number of artifacts. Inside, something rolls over and jumps. Locked on a tricky code lock, so just do not hack it.
 
%c[default]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] important
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] isolating container
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] closed
Zinc container
Killing stalkers
Need to remove this goal here.
A lot of bastards annoys us and generally arrogantly behaves. In general, I give you the coordinates, and you eliminate the target in time. More specifically - for two days. Would you like this?
You're good. Hold on:
Kill the mutants
It is necessary to clean this place from mutants.
Creatures annoy ours, prevent them from arranging ambushes and breeding horses. I give the coordinates, you decide them on time, more precisely in 24 hours, do you agree?
Well done, for the lads you try. Hold on:
Creatures on the farm
Knoll worries that the bloodsuckers who were recently seen on a farm nearby migrating towards the factory need to save the camp from possible danger.

Here on a farm nearby, our bloodsucker saw, maybe there are several of them, I don't know. I am afraid that these scum will get into the factory and even worse, they will arrange a den somewhere under it, and then look for fistula. The case for these places is glaring, so fill them up as soon as possible. I'll give you a deadline - a day. Well, you will fill up or should I find another?
Here, take the artefact, but with the container together - his men squeezed in some kind of green jerk:
Find %s
Baltic asked %s for him
I realy need some tools.
Bring me some tools, if not hard. Will you do it ?
And you are lucky! I will ask Hillock to make for you a discount.
Find %s
Baltic asked %s for him
Can you help with less fuzzy tools? From the whole "hut" you request.
Can you help with less fuzzy tools? From the whole "hut" you request.
You made a big deal for guys, I will tell Hillock to make a doubled discount for you.
Find %s
Baltic asked %s for him
Personally, I ask you to bring me the thieves' tools, unless of course it’s a bummer. Well, how are you?
Personally, I ask you to bring me the thieves' tools, unless of course it’s a bummer. Well, how are you?
From the heart, now I will have with what to solder budies guns.
Strange tunnel
Zhuchila complains about the sloppiness of the local punks. It is necessary to go to the railway tunnel in front of the depot and find the SVD.
There is one deal. One asshole went loose something.

One asshole went into the tunnel, apparently he wanted to prove something to his friends, and you know this tunnel - a terrible place. And to hell with him, but he got there with a new SVD! Maybe he stole if from someone, I don't know. Well, it is clear that he ran into some creatures there, they knocked out his rifle from his hands, and that would be the end of it. So do not disappear the same good? So you go there for her, eh?
Well done, take the gesheft and get some rest, and I'll think about who I can sell this.
We need to find a safer place to sleep.
I found the order documentation. It says that everything connected with the “product” is urgently sent to the Research Institute of the Chernobyl Anomalous Zone “for further study”.
What a bitch! Okay, do your feet from there, you have to think carefully about how to get beyond the perimeter. I will contact you later.
It is necessary to return everything that once helped the fraternity to protect the center of the zone.
Rebirth: Talk to the Mentor
Revival: find and kill Degtyarev
Renaissance: find out from the documentation where "product No. 62" was sent
Librarian: \nWe begin, hurry up.
Recent Orders Documentation

Only order No. 66 attracts attention, from which it follows that the sample of “product No. 62”, exactly like all the documentation on it, was delivered to Scientific Research Institute of the Chernobyl Anomalous Zone. 
 
%c[default]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] military documents
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] important
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] source of information
There will be time, drop by me. I have a business for you.
Hey, you. Do you want to go to the bar, you have to pay. Come to me, I'm standing near the trailer.
Clear the Chimera's Lair
Back to the bridge
To go through the bridge, you need to perform a very interesting task. Or not ... how tired of killing or bringing.
Rebirth: head to the bunker
Revival: find the control room
Rebirth: Talk to the Griffin
Rebirth: protect the control room
Rebirth: Talk to the Griffin
The brotherhood again wants to take advantage of the "Brain Scorcher". I hope we succeed.
Revival: to please Kitsenko
Rebirth: Head to Radar
Rebirth: Talk with Wings Leader
That’s the task. It is necessary to take the box with two cut off stalkers heads to the duty outpost. Well, why? To intimidate them? To show that crazy people still live in the monolith?
Rebirth: Stripping the Barrier
Rebirth: Head to Radar
Rebirth: Talk with Wings Leader
Who pulled my tongue ... even gave grenades.
Rebirth: Follow the Mentor
Rebirth: Talk to the Mentor
Rebirth: Kill Prisoners
Rebirth: Talk to the Mentor
I don’t know what will happen this time.
Rebirth: Meet the rest
Rebirth: Listen to the Mentor
Rebirth: Talk to the Mentor
Rebirth: Complete First Challenge
Rebirth: Return to Mentor
So the day has come that you have been waiting for so long. Go through the thorns and the Monolith will give you what you so much desire.
Griffin: \nNow we need to be at the very end of the complex. So guys, be careful - who knows what awaits us here.
Griffin: \nHere is the control room. It doesn’t look very honest, to be honest. Fighters, let's discuss next steps.

Gatekeeper: \nDo you want to the other side of the bridge, to Limansk? Have to pay. Fortunately, you have to pay a little. To the right in the littered tunnel is a brood of chimeras, kill them and then we'll talk. Go, go, and I'll watch you with binoculars, haha.
Gatekeeper: \nGot it? Well done, we'll lower the bridge. And then these jumping creatures have already pretty much worn out our nerves. Want to come in to trade, please.
Mentor: \nHey, far left - I’m waiting for you in the near future, the work is ready for you.

Mentor: \nWell, have you finished? Sorry I did not see his face at that moment, ha ha ha. So blow on the Radar now, there you are already our intelligence. detachment "Wings" is waiting, you will be in charge of the commander, he will also bring up to date.
Mentor: \nI greet you, fighters of the new Monolith!
Mentor: \nYou are our only hope for the future, brothers. Soon I will test you individually and check whether you are worthy to be in our ranks.
Mentor: \nA currently free. Everything except you is far left. Perhaps I'll start with you.
Fatty: \nLook, I think there should be something in that workshop, like in this building in the middle of the complex.
Fatty: \nI have a bad feeling that someone is picking my brain ...
Fatty: \nMarkholes from this place. Let's check the gearbox booth.
Fatty: \nLet's get out of here soon!
Fatty: \nLook, in my opinion there is nothing here, let's dump it, until those poor fellows were in place.
Fatty: \nYour mother, what a dread ... who is it them? Let's check if they left any mark after themselves.

A common container in these places for storing all kinds of junk. Contains two cut off stalker heads. It smells disgusting. 
 
%c[default]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] technological device
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] important
Container
This box is locked.
Explore the complex
Head back
Kill the controller
Talk to Fatty
Go back to the village
Today we go with Fatty to explore the secrets of the factory complex. Who knows what awaits us there? Important: it is advisable to hurry up in the morning.
Security Officer Records

Absolutely useless notes containing the names and paintings of all employees, which were repeatedly marked at the beginning and end of the working day. However, dates indicate that this complex was used after the first explosion. 
 
%c[default]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] documents
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] important
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] source of information
Production information

It is also not of special value, nothing supernatural happened here, apparently the employees of this plant were mainly engaged in energy issues. 
 
%c[default]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] documents
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] important
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] source of information
Book of accounting

It contains basic information on accountable persons and the material structure of the new enterprise. The lion's share of funds is targeted, received from the state. Unfortunately, no strange materials in the jurisdiction can be found; weapons were not dealt with precisely here. 
 
%c[default]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] documents
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] important
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] source of information
PDA of the dead stalker

It's in bad condition, but a note was attached under the cover, apparently duplicating the last message just for this case: “Stalker, if you read this, it’s better to leave here for good. If you came here hoping to profit, then know that there’s nothing no, although by the time you discovered this CCP, I think you yourself understood everything. I don’t know if we can survive this night, but my feelings are extremely disgusting. It’s as if something is reading my thoughts and mocking us. I don’t have to go with the guys we can terribly fall out of fatigue, make a small stop here I’ll hide the CCP just in case, so that the mutants will not be torn to pieces." 
 
%c[default]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] technological device
Find Fatty weapon
The stalker nicknamed Fatty asked me to get his own weapon for him, which he dropped during an inadvertent investigation of the anomalous substation.
Fatty: \nHey, stalker? Stalker! Please help me, here a bloodsucker from a neighboring house is trying to devour me!
Fatty: \nThank you man, come here, I will open!
Conduct a stalker
A stalker needs the services of a guide who knows a particular area well. We need to deliver it where it should.
Climb the roof of a water tower
Wait an hour while loading
Back to Cook
Cook asked me to climb onto the roof of the water tower in order to download some entertaining information for "Freemen".

Oh, hey, man! Listen, there's a delicate matter, and I have a feeling you're the one I'm looking for. As you know network in the Zone is bad, all interference, magnetic fields, you know, but one of our guys happened to catch a weak signal on a water tower in a village nearby. We've been going there ever since to download or send something, but we'll have to sit there for a while. Anyway, I need you to go and download something special for me. I got it all set up, so all you gotta do is climb up on the tower and wait for it to download. When it's done, bring it to me and don't show it to anybody.
Thanks bro! If you liked it, you can come later, we climb the tower legally.
Freedom laptop

The general laptop of the group, used by it for entertainment purposes. There are some copies of pages on social networks, music, various games, films from arthouse to the most popular at the moment, photographs of the carriers of this information and of course videos with pictures, as well as pornographic pictures. 
 
%c[default]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] technological device
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] low power consumption
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] possibly contains valuable data
Find %s
Sidorovich offers tasks to search for parts of mutant bodies. The lead time is - 3 days.

There is always work. Various private organizations or individuals are often interested in the parts of the bodies of the local fauna, the direction of their activities often fluctuates ... grhm something took me to the wrong place. In short, I give a tip, you bring it. Are you ready?
Right now there is an order for {item_name}. Your term is three days. Well, good luck, do not look.
Yeah, give this stinky shit. Here is your reward:
Repel the zombie attack
Zombies again rod from the Radar, you need to clean them. The lead time is one day.

The zombies again rod from the Radar, how tired they are. We need to meet them on the outskirts of Pripyat and kill them if ours are there, I think they will help you. You need to move forward immediately, you have a maximum day. Are you going?
Good job, take:
Clean the parking from bandits
The bandits settled under the nose of the Debt, you need to remove them. The lead time is one day.

Well, if you can, then you can clear the parking lot from bandits. These freaks are completely fucked up, since they allow themselves to have such neighbors. Yes, and we would have covered them, but I have no extra people. Your deadline is one day. Will you take the task ?
Here is money for your work:
%s - get for the Sultan.
%s - The Sultan asked me to collect this for him.

It is necessary to show the framers their place, but to scare them. It is necessary to collect, but rather to cut or nag something, heh. Do you take I do not limit time. It’s time to recall what gangsters are.
{item_name} - what I need. Collect wherever you want, including from corpses. It doesn’t matter even who you fill up, the main thing is stripes.
Good work, bro. Well, catch your replenishment, yo:
Roof
Pahan wanted me to shake a huckster in a landfill. The lead time is one day.

So, you need to crank one thing. Although those morons at the flea market do not recognize our roof, you have to show them that they will really need our services. Well, what happens in life? Take it right away. There they have a couple of devils on the line, I don’t think that there will be any problems for you. And look, I’m putting rats in your footsteps, if it turns out that at least I’ve squeezed a dime, they will find them in the ditch. I'll give you a day. Well, are you going?
This is all in the common fund, and here are your hard-earned money:
Kill stalkers on the farm
The Sultan wants me to kill stalkers on the farm.
If you want, you can go with the tough guys to the farm and knock off the stalkers there. It's a pain in the ass to have them show up there again. You coming?
Take your share, Rambo:
Beat off the first wave
Beat off the second wave
Beat off the third wave
Return to Max
Max asked for help to clear the barrier from another attack of the “Monolith”.
Listen, our intelligence here has recorded a large cluster of “Monolithians” at the “Barrier” and their number is clearly superior to ours, now every trunk counts for us. Will you help?
Thank you dude. Take what is left of me:
Pseudo-dogs
Jurov asked to deal with pseudo-dogs terrorizing patrols. The lead time is one day.

Yes, the work has appeared. Strip the square indicated in your PDA from the pseudo-dog, this is opposite the village. Sneaky criminals cannot roll them out, I also can’t send mine yet, I need someone to fix the problem with them, otherwise these creatures will gnaw at our patrols at night. I give you a day for everything.
Good. Take as a sign of my personal gratitude:
Patron: dive into the teleport
Patron: clean up the lair
It is necessary to clear the lair of snorks on the South Plateau. He and Noah have some kind of mutual dislike.
Patron: tell Noah about success
Patron: help Noah get hold of a new trunk
Patron: drag Noah to the Protect
Loner life in the Zone isn't easy, and apparently he's gone crazy. We need to bring Noah a Protecta shotgun so he can sleep better at night.
Bloodhound
Fanatic asked to help a frustrated stalker find his father's PM on the ATP. The lead time is one day.
Would you like to earn some money as a detective?

So listen. We had some freaks here who decided to mock the green one, took the PM from him and threw it somewhere on the ATP. As I found out, I immediately drove them out of here to the dicks, I also broke them one properly, but I still did not get a more detailed location of the hidden thing from them. But the boy sits and kills, he got the PM from his father when he still worked in the police. I don’t know what happened to his father, but you need to find the trunk, it’s not humanly to leave him here like that. I'll give you a day to look. Could you help me with this?
Well done, thanks. I don’t know how the Zone is, but I appreciate good deeds well, take some money here that I have stayed here:
Find the lost AK-74
Jurov asked to find an ordinary machine gun outside the territory of the Southern checkpoint. It must be found within 24 hours.

In general, such an incident happened here, I need the help of a man with an eagle eye, if you help, I will be very grateful, just take into account the money is not particularly rich, I will thank you than I have.

One of my fighters lost his machine gun yesterday. He had the urge to go out of need during a patrol, and at that moment a herd of boars came running. Well, this blockhead, shit the pants right there, he threw weapon and run to the outpost right through the minefield. He was lucky that he remained alive, he was probably born in a shirt. The soldier said that he doesn’t remember exactly where he "droped" the weapon, he says that it is possible behind a minefield, in some bushes. My eagles were looking the neighborhood, but found nothing. Tomorrow, a check from above should just come, and if the weapons will not be in place, I will have problems, because the weapons are state-owned. Help me out, find this AK-47, and I'll give you a few bottles of balm for your soul.
Well, let’s check the number. It's it! Thank you for helping, keep my gratitude from me:
Excursion to hell
Sidorovich suggested that he follow the yellow-handed ones until they gain experience.

Work, huh? Well, there is one thing. You aren’t like a green jerk already, as far as I can judge by your profile in the PDA, grh. Ugh. In short, some boobies piled up to me, asking me to show what, and how it is here, in the Zone. Well, I sent them to the Fan, and this damn cunning one said that the KBM is no longer among the newcomers, but I know that extra deaths are not needed here, her reputation, like the nerve cells, is not restored. Therefore, I asked them from the village to wait until I found a suitable candidate. Well, take these jerks around? It is necessary that they do not leave you with empty pockets and with joyful mines on their faces.
Keep a present from these dumbasses for you:
Oh, hello man! Are you going to show us the romance here? Come on, we are at your complete disposal and relax, we are flexible.
Did you want something? Are we doing everything right?
Listen, thank you, man. We will never forget you, and if we reach the Contractor, then we will make your life sugar. Goodbye my friend!
Yeah.
Find 4 detectors, Veles class
Lukash complained that the level of technical support of the group is poor, you need to find 4 Veles detectors.

Oh, you're just in time, because my fighters rarely come to work, but I can't blame them for that. If you don't know, in the old days, at the time of Miklukha, Cook and other unconscious personalities, the level of material support of our faction was pathetically low and we got almost nothing from the "descendants". So, I want to renew the tradition of collecting artifacts so to speak for the people's sake, but we only have a couple of "Echo's" detectors, and one of them was broken. I need four of these detectors, for each I' pay 10000.
Get 4 Echo detectors. I'll pay 10000 UAH for each one.
From thanks, take your money:
Smash the Duty in the village
Lukash knows how to get rid of the Duty once and for all in the village near the path to Rostock, and in this I may come in handy. The lead time is one day.

A delicate matter has formed for me. Do you know that the Duty have been trying monotonously for years to gain a foothold in one of the villages on the way to Rostock? Not? In general, I know how to discourage them from the desire to come there once and for all, and for this we must show them our tactics, so to speak. Some fresh forces arrived there, I really don’t know why they are there, but if we defeat them with half as much, can you imagine what pressure this will bring to them? Well, how did I interest you? Day - the maximum that you will have.

Wonderful! Well done fighter, take this barrel. And do not bend so, the trunk is good, certainly not for this area, but in some places it definitely should come in handy, hehe. Well, take it, don’t think:
Learn about the fate of the Duty comrades
Duty man asked to learn about the fate of his comrades, whom he saw for the last time in the Cemetery of technology near the chemical anomalous zone.

Job? I think it’s unlikely that you can help me. Although wait, have a drink. I went with my comrades to reconnaissance at the equipment cemetery, well, you know this damn place - an endless wasteland with cores of various equipment. Here we were informed that somewhere there they saw the Freedom detachment, but we still did not find these ushlepok ... But we found something else. A frightening something that made my exiles ... Friends fall on their knees and clutch their heads. I do not know why the same thing did not happen to me, as well as why I ran away. It's a shame. Listen, I certainly don’t believe that the guys are still alive, they haven’t heard from them for a couple of days, but can you at least confirm their death? The coordinates of that place I will throw to you on the PDA, it is near some abnormal zone with chemical fumes. Don’t forget to check if you ever pass by, all right?
So are they dead? Hell, you ... Tokens. Hmm ... Thank you, take this for your efforts:
Collect bark from mutilated trees
Sakharov asked him to help with the study of local flora and go to the Red Forest for samples of the bark. The lead time is 3 d

In our environment, the debate over the level of abnormal and radioactive interference in the structure of vegetation, in particular the trees of the so-called "Red Forest", has not subsided for a long time, but all our attempts to deal with it break down over the insurmountable obstacles that our scientific groups have faced. Will you be able to go there and take samples of the bark of the trees there for us? They say the most mutilated are standing near the Symbiote anomaly, so I need them. I'll give you three days, will that suit you?
Thank you very much! Take it, we have collected some money here with our modest staff:
Collect bark from mutilated trees
Herman asked to help him with studies of local flora and go to the Red Forest for samples of the bark.

Ah, welcome. We always have a job, our MBU is one way or another engaged in flora research, for example, some time ago we asked a stalker to deliver us some plants to study its properties. Now we are interested in the anomalous grove in the "Red Forest", in the middle of which is located the anomalous zone "Symbiont". We will need bark samples from the most mutilated trees that you will find. I will give three days for all the chores. Do you agree?
Oh great! Let's get them here ... But they are foning! An urgent need to isolate ... So ... Ah, yes, take a present from me:
Accompany Duty
It is necessary to cover the lonely people when conducting measurements of anomalies on the instructions of scientists.

A group of debtors is recruiting people for some kind of assignment, well, they asked me, as they say, to assist in the search. I don’t know what they will definitely do. They have few people, so someone has to cover their back, do you take?
Thank's man. Here is your reward:
Destroy Civil Zombies
Zombies came to the garbage dump from Yantar and nestled in one of the garbage heaps, you need to neutralize them. The execution time is one day.

There's a job for a hunter. You don't look much like a hunter, though. It's not exactly hunting, though... It's a nasty job, yeah. Look, I don't know how they got here, but there were some civilian zombies on the edge of the junkyard. It's a disgusting view. I'll pay you extra for moral damages, so to speak. I'll text you the coordinates on your PDA. You got 24 hours. Are you ready?

You don't feel sick? Well, have a drink on the house, you'll feel better. Here's a bottle. "Chief gamekeeper," exclusive, yeah... So to speak for the real hunters. It's the only thing in the zone that makes you forget all the horrors. Yeah, and your hard-earned money:
Kill Burers Pyromants
At night burers come out to warm up by the heat near one of the anomalous zones. The execution time is before sunrise.

Healthy helicopter port recorder or "black box", as he likes to be called in the media. Onboard recorders are used for recording internal aircraft systems and crew negotiations, in general, for everything that allows you to determine the possible cause of the crash. In the Zone such devices are equipped with every aircraft, however, the "black box" is not always suitable. In the Zone, they may be interested in the military itself for quite fair reasons, and all sorts of shady, and under the hour and popular in Stalker's environment traders.

 North - Army Warehouses. Duty's "best" friends, Freedom keep it. Thanks for the information, I'll keep it in mind and recommend you to my friends if they need what you do for a living.

Okay, with the Freemen so far silence, digging up, and we and they, I think there will be no special cases soon. Of course, we won't leave them alone, let them not relax. \nThe rest: Bandits aren't dangerous. "The Blue" ones aren't as interested in us as we are in them, but you have to keep your ears sharp with the mercenaries, especially during various searches. The rest of the groups and clans are not dangerous or hostile, except for Monolith. I think there's something bad going on. We don't border on them for good.
How's it going with Duty?

Average, three out of five. Shaky stability in terms of fighters and their influx, but as long as new ones come, not all is lost. Things are worse with the control of territories, on the southern approaches to the eastern part of Pripyat, we could not hold on to the Yanov station. The southern ways to Bar are constantly attacked by bandits and mutants, from the east sometimes pressed by mercs.
How did you lose your place on Yanov?

The black lane went off, first our supply guy was exposed in those parts. The bastard was shoving weapons at all who were not lazy, bandits and mercenaries in general, then he was caught by local Stalkers and was killed in a deal with some types of people, I was charged as a leader. Then an unidentified stalker came out of his skin to get us out of here. This is the result.
I see.
I understand you're a local Merchant
Yes, only at the same time there's Voronin's Deputy Supply Chain Officer and the main ideologist of the group.
I'm sorry, I didn't know how authoritative local merchants could be, and I couldn't guess how close such important people were to normal life.

You flatter me guy, let's get to the point, if you want to trade - we ask for mercy, you can also in the pictures. It is necessary to work if - I'll give you a handout and encourage you, if you do it as necessary.
I don't mind.
Tell me about yourself, Gromov, if you don't mind.

I migrated from Agroproma, promoted me. Before I got into the Zone, I was a locksmith. They appreciate my hands in the group, so they decided to transfer me here. I prefer heavy and assault weapons, I hate snipers in terms of upgrades.
And why are there so many bottles around, Duty for a healthy life?

I can, the work is tedious, and boring here - but you will not go back, there is no base on the Agroindustry. Although I don't know, I would have been alive then, they say the base was killed during the ejection in 2011. Something we have moved away from a theme, do not be shy, give here the toys.
I'm gonna decide what and how to do it now.
What can you say about the Cold?
And what do you say, the guys think his views on the grouping are correct.
And how did he win such "love"?

You know, Lebedev, even though I didn't catch him, but people began to dislike him. He didn't ask for the opinion of the members of the group when he moved them on that very last campaign. That mercenary certainly helped us, but it wasn't worth the "sheepskin dressing up. Those who stayed at the base couldn't do anything about it with the reinforcements of that rabble who had returned after the defeat of the "Renegades". The meaning of the capture of the Swamp came to naught, and the victims were also in vain on their way to the Chernobyl nuclear power plant and here.
I think I'm starting to get the guys' outrage about the former leader.

Listen next... When the rest of the squad returned, we had to fight for a long time and return everything back. We wouldn't have managed in life, the cold through the familiar "free" stalkers came to the guys from the landfill and Cordon, helped the loners and charisma of the new leader. Besides, he gave his word in front of all the fighters without exception not to leave here. Any help, but not the life of our guys.
What's the purpose of your grouping now?

The zone increases every day and we do our best to stop this process. Some are fighting to keep this phenomenon alive, some are fighting to destroy it, but we have our own goals here, and we're not leaving here until we finish them. Okay, it's time to quit fables and probably buy something.
Okay.
Your dog is kind of creepy.
It's not ours, it's Buddy. Doctor's dog. He is old, and the Doctor has heartily asked Cold for a place for him here.
Wow, you can't tell by looking at him that he needs it.
Appearances can be misleading. A beast of the soul, may I now explain to you about these "dogs" and ask you for something?
Go ahead.
"Pseudo-dogs", "Psi-dogs" and "Chernobyls" aren't dogs at all, they seem to be descended from wolves. That's what they taught me in the Duty.
Really, I should write it down, what's the request?

I gather all sorts of stories by virtue of my profession, since we're talking about pseudo-dogs. At the very outskirts of the Plant there is a place similar to our Swamps, it's called Zaton. I heard there's a weirdo on the Old Barge, and he's got a pseudo-dog, too, whether it's fiction or not - you can find out.
Okay, I'll check if I can.

There was a strange stalker who turned out to be an USS major. He helped clean up the neighborhood quite well. But otherwise, some kind of asshole has started recently. Psi-set and "Burner" are working again. There's movement at Chernobyl, and it's not far from here. First, a detachment of experienced stalkers disappeared, then as I heard another squad ran into the "monoliths" in the Sawmill area. After the mess with the soldiers people scattered, which took advantage of the mutants: now close to our "bark". In general, the whole northern part of the Zaton became dangerous, take it into account.
Is there anything important in mind?

There's always something, these cases made my situation a little better. People from the Big Earth are losing their children, husbands and brothers, and of course they care about them. A lot of suckers showed up after hearing about the big score and hiding from all sorts of problems. I want their PDAs. Anything you find, you bring it here. I'll make it worth your while, you hear me?
So fear the North, got it.
Beard means beard.
Absolutely right, I see you're new here.
Yes - decided to look at the famous "Skadovsk" personally, what can you do here?

Yes, anything, after the departure of the Sultan was not so intense in the vicinity to search for artifacts. If you go to the South, towards the Shops of Substations or Waste Recycling Station, be careful. The syndicate there keeps the territory, though adequate, but dangerous. And you don't get sick.

Think about the dangers - you'll estimate it yourself, but keep in mind that when you're fulfilling orders - you're at work and you're in the middle of a job and you're in the middle of a sniffle, throw it away or put it on the shelf, no morale - just a calculation. About the trails through Limansk, it is the safest in terms of movement. The space there is closed, the snipers can't lead you, there are plenty of shelters to cover you from being thrown out and in case of a long firefight. There are also minuses - it is unpredictability of terrain, you do not know what waits around the corner.

Of all the people I know, there are three small dots. The first one is on the Zaton, at the edge of the endless fucking "northern" bogs. The second one is at the devil's side, on the outskirts of the Pripyat. We also have a group settled down, among which a provider is behind the bridge in Limansk, on the outskirts of the "Red Forest". The hospital there is old, but there is no sense to climb there - the path to the Chernobyl nuclear power plant, as well as to the plant Amber cut off by psi-radiation. How will you find yourself in Limansk, stick to the road to the South, but hide your bullets and first-aid kits.
Acccepted, huge "thank you".
Say something about yourself.

Listen carefully. I am a local godfather, you already know my name. Not so long ago I stumbled here from Zaton and pulled the guys with me. We squeezed out the mutants from here and revived the base. On Zaton I was thrown off by one hell of a man. I pretended to be my own and set me up. I had to depart from there.
There's no idea of a fairer, they're throwing ploughmen. What was the name of this freak if his ass was ripped?
Sasha's like, don't touch his ass. You don't have the guts, and this fucker is also a good one.
Recipherable. Tell me about the progress of the Bandits in Zone.

Don't trust anybody but our boys who wear skulls on their sleeves. Remember around you, our enemies are the only ones. In general, evaluate the situation itself, if you feel a condition close to pretzels, ticking boar.
It's understandable, and where more or less quietly can be for my ass.

Listen carefully, kid. From the North from us the Cemetery of technics, our boys there at the old checkpoint near the road and exits from the Army Warehouses keep the stamp, at the Cemetery of that try not to shake at night and in general bypass the old iron. The background sometimes cracked so that the ringing of eggs in the pants can be heard, plus anomalies around and "zerushki" local do not sleep. From the west, the dump is full of anarchy and I won't be able to tell you anything specific about it, I know exactly about the debtors' checkpoint in the north. There is a huge grove in the south, the Dark Hollow is called a wilderness - soldiers there periodically patrol and hang out there. I forgot to say about the Hollow, on the way to it, but we already have an old stalkers' eyes on the Farm blistering, neater. The Grove of that has a huge plus, the road and exit from it lead to Cordon, our find no problem. On Cordon ATP old try to hold on.
Something's a little complicated.

Olivius, why did you have a bad one like that?

Hear the green fucker, what did the blanket mouse bite you for? You don't touch anybody if you've been bitten by a ganduras, you're being bitten by a greyhound. If you touch it, that's how a fucking asshole builds it.

Okay, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, you understand me, too - the old one's gone, nerves aren't to hell.
Done, but why is it Olive's name?

When you lured my ears, I'll tell you what to do. My story has its roots when was Soviet Union. I wanted to live a beautiful life. I used speculation, having burned down on the deal one has got behind bars. I started to look for new acquaintances, found new and stolen kents. I lived like this for three years, and then I did it again. I leaned back, and the trowel wasn't there anymore. And you know what the strangest thing is?
No Olivius, I haven't seen in my life a reasonable age since Soviet Union.
The first move I made turned out to be for "entrepreneurship", speculation on "scoop". Now it is possible to close all successful ones for it. That's where "the noodle burns".

Surfaced after the second time in prison, slipped to the bottom. No profit, every step of the way the same "entrepreneurs" as me. As the Zone was formed, I decided to bring it here.
[further...]
A Olives are called for their ability to quickly get the right gear to the brother, I still have some connections from the past.
Thank you for the story, sorry again.
Bro, tell your story.
You're a prosecutor or something, but I'm not gonna tell you by phone.

When my photo from the "board of honor" did not disappear, worked as a mechanical engineer at the plant and was the best specialist in this profession at his enterprise. I was awarded with prizes and diplomas.
And all of a sudden you wanted to grab a bite to eat, I guess?
You don't interrupt and now pay attention to mine.
Like Transparent from "transparent"?

And you're not as fucked up as I thought you were. I liked to hang out with my buddies in the factory after a difficult shift. The shopkeeper somehow spotted our entertainment and got me fired on the article one day as the last loser.
Life, it's like this.

A lame streak of life has fizzled out. I got a job as a locksmith in the housing and utility sector, and found a friend there - Vitya. Money was paid with "gulkin horseradish", there was enough money for drinking. Once we went out with the kent, I couldn't even remember a fight over what. Anyway, I stabbed him with a screwdriver, and it was a good thing he didn't fall down. They gave me a few years of planing. The bitch's wife while I was sitting there sold out and got away. As the Zone was formed, I decided to pull here, all the whips are the same. I went to the Blatnye dump, assessing me as a mechanic, the locals allowed me to stay. The best time of my life, trunks and vodka dragged boxes.
There's no landfill here, bro.

You're interrupting again. The Big Escape came, we hid like a fucking dick in the hole. As the meeting calmed down and decided to tense the gyrus impregnated on where to "rip claws", the dump turned out to be an unsuitable shelter from the emissions of such. It had to be abandoned forever and moved in small groups and different paths here, to the Dark Valley.

Don't need any officialities or titles, not on the parade. And in case of an attack of mutants or "crawls" what will be long to reprimand. Sergei I or just Sergei.
Nice to meet you.
Mutually, if you fix it, put it out there.
I'd like to know more about the state of affairs.
Boring here, just above the village of Stalker and begins... for us up to Agroprom are enemies.

No, recently the fathers of the commanders brought us an APC, which has already broken down, increased patrols, and the helicopter is constantly able to cover up. Plus, I forgot to tell you how to get out of the checkpoint to the north, walk strictly along the asphalt - a minefield on both sides of the road.
Make a note of it.
You're a technician?

Spleen - "despondency", "moping". At the very beginning of my life in the Zone, I lost a friend and was worried about it for a long time, had little communication at the time and was very boring. That's where I got attached.
Sick, where did you come from?

When the rumors about the soldiers in Pripyat and their departure passed, plus the defeated "Monolith" on the outskirts of the Pripyat, a lot of people moved or intended to move to places that are closer to the Center of the Zone. I just didn't like them very much, the noise was bigger. I "went" to Pripyat, almost took a bullet from a monolithic man and wanted to go back to the bar, where I came from. When I heard about this vessel on Zaton, I decided to try my luck here. And then, fortunately, Cardan was in the spotlight, and after the story with his friends he went into a stop. He was looking for a helper and as it turned out the future successor. I was fond of weapons and ballistics before my appearance in the Zone, and here such a luck and a warm place.
Hmm, lucky you.
Not at all, without normal equipment, I, with a naked ass.
Made profit.
How angry the people have gotten with breakdowns and repairs, they probably heard about the "monolithic" attacks.
I heard, of course, I wouldn't bother to bump into them myself. Good luck, Spooky.
You're Cardan, right?
Yes, a former technician from Skadovsk that's on Zaton.
Aren't your hands there? How will the guys be fixed without you?
Don't worry, I left a traveling "student" there instead of myself, Spleen is called.
Say something about yourself.
When two of my friends came to that "ship", then they got pissed off during the drunkenness, and they split up who they were.
Tell me about your friends.

Joker and Barge. Both young and hot, all trying to prove something. Only they are both dead, their PDA brought me one stalker. I was drunk, and I wanted to get ready to look for them. Stalker was ahead of me.
And drunk what?
Backed up. With repairs and upgrades, too, I'll still be on the small things to help nitrogen and look at the locals.
Thank you for the story.
Tell us about yourself.
They call me Asot. I came from the base of "Debt" in the Bar, when it settled down here. I was repairing trunks and armor, and I had to deal with more subtle things.
Your friends are gone, but you were left surrounded by something like "enemies", how so?
There is no Bar and no Arms, no enemies here. Local society appreciates me and I appreciate it, although I do not like Freedom.
And what are the more subtle types of work?
Yes, I had one “client”, then the “black box” drags, then the work with the elevator power supply will throw the old one. These are things of the past days, it became boring without “Debt”.
Why?

They have ongoing sweeps and operations. Either some creature will tear the armor, or the trunk will jam. In general, a job for me and fat. And these are just a jamb to indulge and neigh, from breakdowns only lighters.
And who is sitting next to you?
This is Cardan, recently came from Zaton. He will tell about himself.
I get it.
Are you the main thing here?
So it is - Loki is my name, deputy Mikluha at this Station.
An interesting name - like the deity of the Scandinavian so called.
The way it is. It clung to me during a breakthrough through the "Burnout". Dashing times were.
Will you tell me?

Good. When the Burnout was turned off, my detachment set out on a campaign to the North. They walked for a long time, wild places around. As the Chernobyl loomed on the horizon, they began to search for a place for the camp. Found this station abandoned and settled here. Next, start the fever of the Zone and "Duty" appeared. Unfamiliar places, few people, and emissions were more frequent. Having concluded a ceasefire, they agreed at the Station to hold their weapons in holsters and scabbard knives.
Where are these duties now?

There are none of them whom they did not have time to shoot, they themselves fled. Not so long ago, one stalker loomed with us, their name was Sasha. Not sickly helped us, a lot of good deeds done. But the last straw was the information from the CPC of their founder, judging by which "Duty" was founded by the former military on a compulsory basis. Their captain (now the late "general") simply cut off contact with the headquarters. This infuriated the local stalker, just as puzzled some of the enemy fighters. After all, it was like at the station: purely equilibrium. And after the help of that stalker and fighters, we appeared, as if straight from the air, and there were plenty of defectors with sympathizers. Here we are the force of "Debt" and expelled from here.
Where did this Stalker go?
I don’t know, but the last time he and the “company” were seen leaving towards Jupiter. And I was not up to it, to be honest.
Tell me about the surroundings. What is it worth to be afraid of?

The beasts are full. And to be honest, then we missed the "Monolithians", the bastards managed to settle in the old Depot. In general, they have a decent base there. In the north, Kopachi is full of zombies, in the area of the ventilation complex and the Volkhov air defense system, there are also a lot of them, keep an eye

I need batteries for the Gauss rifle.

Hold it.

See, take it:
Well, how do you feel?

Head spins a little bit and it gets darker in my eyes... How interesting it is to see how I managed to get here. Now I will lie down and smell ammonia, and then I will have to close the wound. Take there how much money you need in the lower pocket of your backpack and come up in a couple of days if you need help. Yes, by the way, I never introduced myself, I'm called Kashpirovsky, I'll treat local stalkers here. Uh, well, I'm going to go, because my legs are not holding.
How you doing, hero?
Oh, hi. Yes, it is gradually healing. The main thing is that I sewed it up, but the bruise, by the way, makes itself felt. He kicked me hard then.
And what did you do to get there at all?

You've been looking for adventure. We had rumors here that after the tunnel was thrown down, it was partially collapsed and something strange was found there. Either the creatures that settled, say the corpses in the area found, the bones are all eaten up and unarmed, which is the strangest thing. Well, then I found out what was the point, and I wish I could have gotten away even without my own bag. Oh, it's a good thing I took it after all. Those things came out of the ground! Fucking simple.

Yeah, that's what got you. Well, you stay out of it, all the more so because you have a useful skill, sit and make money for yourself. This is not for you in the polyclinic of nocturnal old women to take for a miserable salary.
You're right, I'm arguing a feverish argument. Well, be my friend, I still have to sort the ampoules here, good luck!
I'm not sure, but I think I found a spy. I can show and bring.
Come on.
I think this is the first brother I've ever spoken to. He's a bit nervous, isn't he?
I think it's the second brother I talked to. He's closed, hiding something, I think.
Kind of like the third brother I talked to. Too sociable, and also for the sake of money he came here... I couldn't think of a better excuse.
Definitely the fourth brother I spoke to. He was strange, he was too right. I wanted to please you, you fell.

You're a hell of a detective, bro. Thought I'd just let it go? You were being watched by our guys, so they already took care of the "traitor". You didn't deserve the reward and didn't live up to my hopes, if you went to Radar, to meet with the band "Wings", they would need help now.

Well done, you might say. I sent a couple of my people to look after you, of course I couldn't leave such a serious matter in your care alone. Don't worry, we've already dealt with the slate. We got a message from Griffin, go to Radar, and the Wings need your help. Well, hold the shotgun, I deserve it. You will need more.
Hey, how do you like it here?
Yeah, it's a little uncomfortable. But this is always the case in a new place, brother. I heard that the Mentor will call us all there for some reason?
I heard. What do you think about it?

I'm afraid I failed my first test. Is it a joke to go into the anomalous zone? I think he's afraid that I got the wrong artifact or brought it from the wrong place... Oh, my God. Leave me alone for now, man.
Hello. Did you hear that the Mentor calls us all in one by one?
I've heard of course, but what do I care? So he needs it that way.
And how do you like it here?
Not in the mood to rant, I'm getting ready for my third test.
Hello, brother. All of them are silent. Can't find a minute to talk?
Why not? How do you like it here?
Em, that's okay. The main thing is that I'm under the wing of the guys who will fulfill my dream after all.
And what's your dream?
If it's about dreams to talk to everyone, it's a goal, not a dream. What are you here for?

Yes, in general, for the sake of money. Well, what else would an honest stalker dream of? Oh, okay. You're a good man, of course, but I want to take a break from talking. So many things I have heard today...
Hello. How do you like it here, in the monolith?
You know, I'm an experienced walker and I had such a "child's" dream of being in a monolith. I'm already there with one foot.
And what do you expect the fraternity to do?
Yeah, I just want to give this case a head start, you know? Nobody is waiting for me there, on the big land. Okay, I still have to sort the crap here from the second test. Be my guest, brother.
Well, what? You do it, don't be shy: put all your holey vests, broken vests... I don't promise a lot on my sober head, but why not take a look?
Hey, are you looking for an experienced stalker to cover your back?

Healthy. Are you the experienced one? Wow, you gave it away. Come on, bro, don't be mad, I was joking. I would have gone and defeated them all myself, but a partner in this case will never be superfluous. So, let's go?
Let's go.
What else do you need help with?
Hasn't been here that long, another jerk from the village. He was always fucking with me about my appearance, could you kill that freak?
How am I gonna kill him, and if anybody finds out, they're gonna unscrew my head.

They won't know. In short, I heard that this freak is looking for someone to go to see the neighborhood and pillage with, just say that you're an experienced stalker, take him to the bandits or mutants, and drop it - let them tear him up there. Will you do it? I won't have an award for you, just take his things, if you want.
Well, I'll do it.
It's too much, don't you find it? No.
Any thoughts?
Let's check this checkpoint, see if there's anything left, I don't think we've seen it.
I think it's worth checking out this administration building in three floors in the middle of the complex and the workshop, too.
Forget it, huh? Let's look here, maybe the stalkers have left some information about themselves in life. Only for a long time I do not want to stay here, I have a bad feeling.
Let's check the hangar, see if there's anything out there.
Wind, I suppose?
Will you tell me about yourself?
Why?
You're a Pegasus, did I get that right?
Hey, man. Want to meet?
Well, yeah. How did you get here?

Yeah, I crossed the army line like that and found myself Are you sure you want to hear why? Oh, but I'm hardly going to answer your question, you won't understand me. It is very personal and it is enough that "o-consciousness" can lead me to my dream. In the "wings" I was like one of the most accurate shooters, but I don't like sniper rifles very much.
Who are "o-conscious"?

I don't believe you haven't heard or you're asking me for my opinion? They're not mythical creatures, they're a real group of scientists' husbands who have somehow come to the noosphere. I managed to visit the military lab there somehow, already from the North of the Zone, and you know, their technology impressed me. The holograms are all monstrous equipment... It is difficult to believe that all this current Ukrainian government has been growing on the remains of Soviet equipment at its side. And you know, I'd rather be with those who inspire me confidence than with some fucking debtors.
